text: Letter dated 17 March 2016 from the President of the Security Council addressed to the Secretary-General

I have the honour to inform you that your letter dated 15 March 2016 (S/2016/258) concerning your intention to appoint Mr. Nicholas Haysom (South Africa) as your Special Envoy for the Sudan and South Sudan has been brought to the attention of the members of the Security Council. They take note of the intention expressed in your letter.
